   Release Notes:



   It is 1940 &amp; all of France is occupied by the German army. French military 

   forces have been decimated, their leaders routed, &amp; the European mainland 

   plunged into the hands of the Wehrmacht.



   Experience the heroic struggles of the French resistance who will not be 

   oppressed by the enemy. Fight with inadequate means against an overpowering 

   army of exceptionally equipped &amp; trained soldiers. Lay traps, &amp; plan 

   ambushes. Capture &amp; use heavily armed tanks &amp; other German weapons, using 

   them to your advantage. Cut off &amp; interrupt enemy supply routes &amp; help to 

   increase the number &amp; strength of the resistance to chase the unwelcome 

   forces out of your land!



   Features:

  

    ÃƒÂ¾ 4 campaigns with over 40 missions 

    ÃƒÂ¾ Infiltrate buildings and abandoned vehicles with your ground troops 

    ÃƒÂ¾ 3D maps enhance the game play experience 

    ÃƒÂ¾ True to history, the campaign missions take place in various seasons 

      of the year, greatly affecting your strategies 

    ÃƒÂ¾ True real-time: night and day will occur during your missions, 

      changing light and visibility 

    ÃƒÂ¾ 15 extra missions to play in Skirmish mode 

    ÃƒÂ¾ The easy-to-use editor allows you to create your own missions to play 

      single-player or multiplayer 

    ÃƒÂ¾ 8-player multiplayer over Internet or LAN.

 Install Notes (Please follow these instructions IN ORDER)



   1. Unpack the release with WinRAR or equivalent



   2. Burn using Nero, CDRWIN or equivalent.



   3. Install.

 

   4. From the /Crack/ directory on CD1 copy &quot;PanzerClawsII.ex1&quot; and

      &quot;PanzerClawsII.ex2&quot; to where you installed the game and overwrite the

      existing files.



   5. Run game and when asked for serial use the following:



       EGR7-JHNE-6RE2-SK2K

       N7HE-99DJ-MNB3-29LU

       CNGS-6JT8-2BAD-N5FM



      These are also found in serials.txt on the crack directory for your

      convenience.  Enjoy!
